name: SpeechErrorInfo
desc: Defines a speech error information structure.

items.name: init(count: Int16, oldest: OSErr, oldPos: Int, newest: OSErr, newPos: Int)
var count: Int16
items.desc: The number of errors that have occurred in processing the current text buffer since the last call to the GetSpeechInfo function with the soErrors selector. Of these errors, you can find information about only the first and last error that occurred.

items.name: var newPos: Int
items.desc: The character position within the text buffer being processed of the most recent error.

items.name: var newest: OSErr
items.desc: The error code of the most recent error.

items.name: var oldPos: Int
items.desc: The character position within the text buffer being processed of the first error that occurred after the previous call to the GetSpeechInfo function with the soErrors selector.

items.name: var oldest: OSErr
items.desc: The error code of the first error that occurred after the previous call to the GetSpeechInfo function with the soErrors selector.
